mean_cn: n. 住宿，留宿，膳宿供应
mean_en: a place to live, work or stay in; somewhere to live or stay, often also providing food or other services
sentence: Most universities provide wonderful accommodations for students these days.
sentence_trans: 现在多数大学都会为学生提供良好的住宿条件。
word_etyma: ac加强 + com睡 + mod模式 + ation表名词 + s表复数 → accommodations住房，住宿
